last_episode_to_air.name: The Universe
last_episode_to_air.overview: With the cards finally on the table, Ava and Nathan race against time to prevent a tragedy.

name: Based on a True Story
overview: The lives of a realtor, a plumber and a former tennis star unexpectedly collide, exposing America’s obsession with true crime, murder and the slow-close toilet seat.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Season two finds new parents Ava and Nathan Bartlett three months into parenthood. Focused on taking care of her family, Ava is determined to resist her true crime obsession and return to work as a real estate agent while Nathan trains private tennis clients. But a series of new murders pulls her back in - is Matt behind the slayings? Is Tory, now entangled in a relationship with Matt, in danger? For a while, life is good -- Ava's TikTok habit and her new friend Drew provide a welcome distraction, and Nathan's all in on reigniting his tennis career as well as his friendship with Matt -- until danger comes knocking, literally.

tagline: True Crime is an obsession that never dies.

episodes.name: The Great American Art Form
episodes.overview: A married realtor and a former tennis star struggle to stay afloat as a serial killer puts LA on alert.

episodes.name: BDE
episodes.overview: After Nathan's botched proposal, Ava fights to keep him on target. When detectives visit the club, a petrified Nathan worries he's a suspect. Matt asks to meet.

episodes.name: Who's Next?
episodes.overview: While seizing creative control, Matt drops in on Nathan at the Beverly Club. Ava and Nathan try to maintain power. Nathan struggles to keep his story straight.

episodes.name: The Survivor
episodes.overview: Ava, Nathan  and Matt attend a true crime convention; a surprise panelist threatens the podcast.

episodes.name: Ted Bundy Bottle Opener
episodes.overview: Ecstasy. Murder. Ruby drags Ava and Nathan on a wild night out after tragedy strikes Crime Con.

episodes.name: Love You, Buzzfeed
episodes.overview: Ava and Nathan attend a charity auction at Ruby’s mansion, where new and old wounds are laid bare.

episodes.name: National Geographic
episodes.overview: Nathan reckons with a devastating failure. Ava confronts her buyer. Matt takes a new approach.

episodes.name: The Universe
episodes.overview: With the cards finally on the table, Ava and Nathan race against time to prevent a tragedy.
